ModMetaData.name: Difficulty Tweaks
ModMetaData.author: Einkil
ModMetaData.description:
A custom Difficulty. Designed for personal use. Instead of modifying sliders every time we start a new game, we simply load this! We still have to modify a few sliders: * Friendly Fire chance * Colonist Instant Kill * Wealth Time Factor
These don't appear to have an exposed DifficultyDef to modify.
Feel free to use and abuse to create your own preset.
